text: Engineering is the fight against complexity.
If you shake a box of lego long enough, at some point it will be assembled by chance.
Does schrödingers cat observe itself being dead and alive?
Life 4.0 will be able to rewrite the universe by exploiting the simulation and changing the rules of physics.
I think turing was right in the sense that if you can't tell a difference, there is no difference.
The universe is a computer built to compute itself.
Life exists because it wastes more useful energy than dead matter.
Learning is the lossy compression of information to store it in the finite memory of the brain.
The brain is an information cache, with the internet as the source.
We need to build factories the same way we build computers: Software defines what is done, not hardware.
